canLeaveCharged.note: The extra amount of reqs for making this a suitless possibility is just too much.

nodes.name: Cleared Central Platform Junction
nodes.note: This node is only considered reached if the enemy is clear of platforms, to setup a SpeedBooster strat

to.note: This link goes straight from 3 to 2 because waiting for the Sova is the same time, regardless of how quickly you can travel through the other nodes. FIXME there is a morph dboost strat that works here. What tech should that use, and what heat frame count?
Node 4 is considered equivalent to 5 (though 5 isn't equivlent to 4).

strats.name: IBJ
strats.note: Does this heat frame count required a midair IBJ? If so, should we have two separate strats?

to.note: FIXME Apparently there's a way to get this without Morph?

strats.name: Frog Speedway Clip
strats.note: This room has a bunch of offscreen shot blocks, and shooting enough of them with wave + spazer or plasma allows you to run through the speed blocks when going right to left.

obstacles.name: Power Bomb Blocks
obstacles.note: The Power Bomb blocks above the bottom doors

obstacles.name: Morph Maze
obstacles.note: The bomb blocks in the Morph maze above the bottom doors

to.note: This link only includes ways of crossing to 7 that can't be done from node 9

strats.name: Bubble Mountain X-Ray Climb (Bottom)
strats.note: This strat starts from 5 on the basis that 4 -> 5 is free.

strats.name: Morph Maze
strats.note: B could also be broken with Power Bombs, but that's made redundant by the PB Blocks strat.

strats.name: Bubble Mountain Dboost
strats.note: Dboost off a Waber to cross the gap.

to.note: This link only includes ways of crossing to 1 that can't be done from node 9

strats.name: Morph Maze
strats.note: B could also be broken with Power Bombs, but that's made redundant by the PB Blocks strat.

strats.name: Bubble Mountain Delayed Walljump (Right)
strats.note: A tricky, delayed walljump makes it possible to climb to top right in-room, with nothing.

strats.name: Bubble Mountain Save Room Jump
strats.note: It's possible to climb up with a regular walljump, not a tricky one, with enough speed from the adjacent room.

enemies.name: Geruta
enemies.note: Accessible without Gravity going left to right but not right to left with speedbooster. Letting it slide

enemies.name: Yapping Maw
enemies.note: Possible but requires multiple spikehits in most configurations so rarely worth it

runways.note: Can't charge in lava, so doesn't work coming in from the top left door

to.note: Is a heatroom when entering from bottom but not when entering from top.

enemies.name: Dragon
enemies.note: Drops can be reached from land

to.note: This link exists because of how Samus takes heatdamage while riding the elevator.
